ygData.subject: Re: My wishlist on the interface
ygData.msgSnippet: I carry 20 throwing knives - carry over from before Bellow - for pulling mobs out of a hopefully lulled crowd.  Plus I like the idea of throwing a dagger
ygData.messageBody:
I carry 20 throwing knives - carry over from before Bellow - for pulling
mobs out of a hopefully lulled crowd. Plus I like the idea of throwing a
dagger <eg> If I loot rustys, I'll throw them for fun. And now pass me the
cheese, I am about to whine...

<waaa> I wish bards could equip bows! I think it looks so cool when someone
shoots a bow and arrow! And looking cool is most important for bards! Lets
petition them and get SoW made slower and bow and arrows for bards! <eg>

<mmm nice camembert>

Sylly
Bard of the 13th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out in Qeynos Hills on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Simpson [mailto:gohorns@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 08, 1998 4:25 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] My wishlist on the interface

From: "Andy Simpson" <gohorns@...>

On a related note, have any of you bards used throwing skill
at all? I've
found it to be a collosal waste of money so far, but maybe I
am doing it
wrong. :)
